intro: I provide expert web and mobile application solutions using a variety of JavaScript technologies, mostly with React, but also with Angular, Vue, Svelte, ExtJS, and other front-end frameworks.  Having worked on web applications for over two decades, I can offer fast, high-quality consulting expertise for new and existing web and mobile applications.
availability: Remote or local to Charlotte, NC
summary: Please browse this site to learn more, and feel free to contact me using the navigation above for more info.
